SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class ViewGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.ViewGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
View, Runnable
public class ViewGUI extends Object implements View, Runnable
This class represents the GUI view of the game. It implements the View interface and the Runnable interface.

    • playCard

      public Player playCard(PlayableCard cardOnBoard, PlayableCard card, AngleOrientation orientation) throws InvalidCardPositionException, NotExistingPlayerException, NotTurnException, RequirementsNotMetException, CardTypeMismatchException, ServerDisconnectedException, IOException, AngleAlreadyLinkedException
      Method to play a card
      Parameters:
      cardOnBoard - The card on board
      card - The card to be played
      orientation - The orientation of the card
      Returns:
      The player after the card is played
      Throws:
      InvalidCardPositionException - If the card position is invalid.
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      NotTurnException - If it is not the player's turn.
      RequirementsNotMetException - If the requirements are not met.
      CardTypeMismatchException - If the card type is mismatched.
      ServerDisconnectedException - If the server is disconnected.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      AngleAlreadyLinkedException - If the angle is already linked.

      public void drawCard(CardType cardType, DrawPosition drawPosition) throws NotExistingPlayerException, NotTurnException, ServerDisconnectedException, IOException, AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException, DeckIsEmptyException
      Method to draw a card
      Parameters:
      cardType - The type of the card to be drawn
      drawPosition - The position to draw the card from
      Throws:
      NotExistingPlayerException - If the player does not exist.
      NotTurnException - If it is not the player's turn.
      ServerDisconnectedException - If the server is disconnected.
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      AlreadyThreeCardsInHandException - If there are already three cards in hand.
      DeckIsEmptyException - If the deck is empty.
